description: This schema is used to represent a Clique Gaming Credential.
title: Clique Gaming Credential 2

credentialSubject.description: Stores the data of the credential
credentialSubject.title: Credential subject

sumHoursPlayedInTopIGDBCategorySteam.description: Number of hours played in top IGDB category.
sumHoursPlayedInTopIGDBCategorySteam.title: Number of Hours Played in Top IGDB Category

sgxAttestationFileId.description: This is an offchain storage of the SGX attestation for this VC where you can verify in clique.social
sgxAttestationFileId.title: SGX Attestation File ID

sumHoursPlayedInIGDBCategoryPieChartStea.description: Number of hours played in IGDB category, shown in PieChart
sumHoursPlayedInIGDBCategoryPieChartStea.title: Number of Hours Played in IGDB Category in PieChart

sgxAttestationFileId.description: This is an offchain storage of the SGX attestation for this VC where you can verify in clique.social
sgxAttestationFileId.title: SGX Attestation File ID

sumHoursPlayedInTop10GameSteam.description: Number of hours played in user's top 10 games
sumHoursPlayedInTop10GameSteam.title: Number of Hours Played in Top 10 Games

sgxAttestationFileId.description: This is an offchain storage of the SGX attestation for this VC where you can verify in clique.social
sgxAttestationFileId.title: SGX Attestation File ID

avgMonthlySpendingSteam.description: Average amount of money spent each month over the past three years.
avgMonthlySpendingSteam.title: Avg Monthly Amt Spent in Past 3 Years

sgxAttestationFileId.description: This is an offchain storage of the SGX attestation for this VC where you can verify in clique.social
sgxAttestationFileId.title: SGX Attestation File ID

id.description: Stores the DID of the subject that owns the credential
id.title: Credential subject ID
